Text: Oñ ubi e̩wñ kide̩ Po̩l kwo bʼAte̩ns te̩ oñ i lewa Ko̩rint;

tak abu kʼi fʼe̩ne̩Juʼka kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Akwila, kʼi chʼo̩lo̩pu Pontus kʼowñ kpai o̩ya-wñ Prisila ma kwo Itali wa kpo̩kpe̩ n li (todabu ki Klaudius dʼo̩da te̩ ka kʼamaju chaka ki kwo bo̩ Rom te̩); i lewa ugbo ma;
oñ ukpe̩ kʼobe-wñ chʼoka kpʼe-ma, i gugu ugbo ma oñ ma chuko̩lo̩; todu ma chʼabo ku ma hi unyabo ta, obe-ma de̩.
Tak i nako̩la rʼuma eju ef unyi ujeju-ma o̩jo̩ uñmi o̩jo̩ uñmi, i la che kʼi tʼamaJu kpai amaGrik eju gu.
Ama e̩gba ku Sailas kpai Timoti kwo Masidonia wa, abu kʼo̩la le̩ mu Po̩l ne̩ gaga i nagbibenu ñw amaJu nyo̩nyo̩ kakini, Jisus che Kraist le̩.
Ama abu ku ma fʼalu jo̩ nyʼu ku ma la chʼakpabie̩-wñ, i fʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ gbanyo̩, i ka ñw uma kakini, E̩bie̩-me̩ ki dʼoji o̩la-me̩ ke, omi de̩ hiolo, akwe̩gba-i nanyi ugbo abo uche̩ichi.
Tak abu kʼi kwo bʼo̩mo̩ te̩ i lewa unyi e̩ne̩ʼka kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Taito̩s Justus, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi kpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ kʼunyi-wñ dago o̩la unyi ujeju le̩.
Ama Krispus, agboji unyi ujeju le̩, ke̩do̩no Ondu kpʼo̩gbo̩ abunyi-wñ du; tak abo Ko̩rint wewe kʼuma gbo̩ ke̩do̩no, ma la che ma baptism.
Oñ Ondu ka ñw Po̩l ef ane̩ ego odu kakini, E̩ ki railo n, e̩ nako̩la waa, e̩ ki la hi alu-we̩ de n:
todabu kʼomi dʼubi-we̩, e̩ne̩ du la akobʼuwe̩ kʼi achʼuwe̩ e̩bie̩ne̩ n; todabu kʼamone̩ wewe jʼewo-i ñw mi.
Oñ i gugu o̩mo̩ o̩do̩ʼka kpai ochu me̩fa akone̩ o̩lO̩jo̩ ef uma.
Ama adiko ku Galio chʼakoji-onu Akaya, amaJu nʼibe okate kwane̩ tu Po̩l o̩la oñ ma dʼu nyʼo̩gba-e̩de̩;
ma kakini, E̩ne̩ kide̩ agba amone̩ ibe ku ma kpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ alu kʼo̩lo̩da ma je̩ n.
Ama abu ku Po̩l che kʼi chi alu-wñ, Galio ka ñw amaJu kakini, AmaJu, i ma chʼe̩wñ uji abe̩k e̩wñ udu bibi, i ma nʼe-i kʼu naje̩ kpai ame̩;
ama i chʼe-ene e̩te̩ ugbo uko̩la alu ofo, kpai odu one̩ edo̩ kpai o̩lo̩da e-me̩, me̩ fejutʼe-le̩ o̩to̩to̩la-me̩; omi neku kʼu chʼakajo̩ abe̩le̩ n.
Oñ i fʼuma ne kwo bʼo̩gba e̩de̩ te̩.
Tak o̩chaka-ma mu Sostenes, agboji unyi ujeju, du tʼopee o̩gba e̩de̩ akpʼo̩ igbe. E̩wñ-i du la wu Galio eju n.
Tak abu ki Po̩l ño̩ nʼo̩jo̩ je̩ o̩mo̩ wewe, i chʼamo̩maye le̩ agbo, oñ i kwotʼo̩ko̩ alo tu Siria, Prisila kpʼAkwila le bʼowñ (i fʼoji-wñ ja Se̩nkria; todu i fʼoji da).
Oñ ma lewa E̩fe̩sus, tak i tʼuma no̩ jʼo̩mo̩; owñ onugo muda mugudu tef unyi ujeju akʼo̩la rʼamaJu eju.
Abu ku ma gbo̩ko̩bʼo̩ kʼi ño̩ bʼuma nʼo̩jo̩ je̩ ta, i ko̩.
Ama i che ma agbo, i kakini, O̩jo̩ je̩, nañʼadabi wʼugbo me̩. I tʼo̩ko̩ kwo E̩fe̩sus.
Tak abu kʼi kwotʼane̩ Se̩saria, kʼi la mute̩gu nyʼagwa ujeju abudo̩ Ondu, i gwo̩ru tʼAntio̩k.
Tak abu kʼi kpo̩kpe̩ o̩mo̩ pe̩ i kwʼo̩mo̩ le, oñ i lale gu ane̩ Galatia kpai Frigia du aro̩ne aro̩ne, i hi amako̩che̩ le̩ chaka e̩re̩ nyane̩.
Oñ e̩ne̩Juʼka kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Apo̩lo̩s, ku ma bi Ale̩kisandria, lewa E̩fe̩sus; e̩ne̩ kʼi nʼukpahiu ef o̩lO̩jo̩, kʼi meju eko̩la e̩te̩le̩ i che.
E̩ne̩ le̩ chʼone̩ ku ma nʼalu ko̩ o̩kalatu o̩na Ondu; abu kʼi la chʼe̩ne̩do̩ chacha, i nʼo̩la Jisus aka kpʼe̩kʼone̩ tʼeju-wñ kpakpa; o̩la baptism Jo̩n kate oñ i chʼo̩ka-wñ.
Oñ e̩ne̩ le̩ chane̩ eko̩la kpai eju e̩gbo̩ ef unyi ujeju. Oñ abu ku Prisila kpai Akwila gbʼo̩la-wñ, ma mʼowñ gba cho̩la, taku ma mʼe̩wñ o̩na O̩jo̩ dute̩ ñw u o̩bie̩ o̩bie̩ tule.
Oñ abu ki neku elalegudu nyʼAkaya amo̩maye le̩ kʼowñ e̩che, ma kʼo̩takada rʼamako̩che̩ ku ma yo̩ ñw u: oñ abu kʼi lewa o̩mo̩ i bʼabo ku ma ke̩do̩no lef ufe̩de̩-nyo̩ che nana;
todu i dʼo̩la bi amaJu kpaka ejo̩ja, i nʼO̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ aña ma ka ki Jisus che Kraist le̩.
